title: Modern Mathematics Microlearning Course for Strengthening Practitioner Competencies

context.additional_context: Customized education aimed at improving workplace efficiency and data interpretation skills for in-service professionals, with smartphone-based content designed for PC-unavailable environments.

learning_goals: Learners can apply basic statistical techniques to accurately interpret numerical data related to their work.
Learners can voluntarily complete learning modules at least three times per week using mobile devices in a limited-technology environment.
Learners can apply 80% or more of the learned mathematical concepts to work processes, improving practical problem-solving rates by 30%.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
